description:
A desperate man is plagued by a tumor shaped like a human face. When the tumor begins to talk and think, renegade surgeon Black Jack is the one man who can free the victim from its grotesque tyranny. Meanwhile, a serial murderer is on the prowl, a criminal beset by an identical deformity. Black Jack must decipher the connection before the hideous mutation devours its host, body and soul!
Source: tezukainenglish.com

titles.title: The Carbuncle with a Human Face
